Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This is my code! It controlls the search engline. It handles the setup of the inverted index and the retreival of search results.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        public Controller(StopList stoplist,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> docArray,
                  boolean trace)
           throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Parameters:
        stoplist - is a collection of words to ignore in the search
        docArray - is a collection of documents which are indexed
        trace - if true print whole document if found in search
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

    • Method Detail

      • retrieve

        public void retrieve(java.lang.String querryString)
              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        searches through the index for the documents which contain the search querry and prints them out. if the querry is multi word it will only print documents which hold all words searched.
        Parameters:
        querryString - is the search(s) Expected efficiency is quadratic
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • intersection

        public void intersection(java.util.Set<Document> finalSearch,
                         java.util.Set<Document> search)
        gets the intersection of the two sets and stores in finalSearch
        Parameters:
        finalSearch - is the set which will store the intersection
        search - is the new search to be intersected with finalSearch Expected efficiency in constant time
